org.xmlcml.cml.tools
Class PiSystemManager

java.lang.Object
  org.xmlcml.cml.tools.PiSystemManager

public class PiSystemManager
extends java.lang.Object

manage counting and management of double bonding. manages the strategy for adding multiple bonds and charges. still evolving

Author:
pmr
